field.name: yj_menu_sub_title
field.label: Sub title
field.description: Add your menu item description here.You can also include HTML

field.name: yj_group_holder
field.label: Act as group holder?
field.description: If selected yes , this will be the main group holder. Please assign this as a parent to all groups you want to be visible inside this menu item. Note that this can only be a Normal link , not module and not module position

field.name: yj_sub_group_width
field.label: Sub groups width
field.description: Sub groups width assigns width to Group holder sub groups.Example if you have 3 sub groups enter each group width.1 per line.

field.name: yj_item_type
field.label: Menu item type
field.description: You can select what type of the item this would be . Module, module position, Normal link. If this item is a group holder please leave default value.Normal link

field.name: yj_menu_show_title
field.label: Display link title, image and sub title if link type is module?
field.description: If set to NO Link title , link image and link description will not be displayed.This option is functional ONLY if link type is module or module position. This is usefull if you like to show only module with its tile. For example Login Form

field.name: yj_mod_id
field.description: Use Ctrl-click to select more than one item.
field.label: Select one or more module
field.query: SELECT id, module, title FROM #__modules WHERE `client_id`=0 AND module != 'mod_mainmenu' ORDER BY position ASC

field.name: yj_position
field.description: Use Ctrl-click to select more than one item.
field.label: Select one or more position
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT position FROM #__modules ORDER BY position ASC
